alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 6:49AM MDT until June 14 at 10:44PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. .The combination of snowmelt and heavy rainfall will lead increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From this morning to late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, or 2254 cfs... Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain right around flood stage today, then rise above flood stage after midnight tonight, and crest at 4.4 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 06/07/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 4.0 Sun 6 am MDT 4.2 4.3 3.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
